long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Find the best deals 🇬🇧 for UK and discounts for personal use and business needs. Save on travel ✈️, entertainment 🎬, technology 💻, and more. Start exploring, living, and shopping 🛍️ on a budget today!

Never miss a deal again! ✨ Our browser extension automatically finds coupons and discounts for your favourite online stores.  💰

Here's how it works:
- Visit your favorite online store. 🛍️
- Our extension automatically detects the site and searches for available deals. 🕵️‍♀️
- Get instant notifications about coupons, discounts, and promo codes. 🔔
- Save money without ever leaving the store's website! 💸

Lightweight and Privacy-Focused:
- Featherlight: We won't slow you down – our extension is designed for speed and efficiency. 🚀
- Respectful of your privacy: We never track your data. Your browsing habits are your own. 🔒
- No annoying pop-ups or ads: Just pure savings, delivered seamlessly. ✨

The BudgetFitter Difference:
- Hand-picked and verified deals: We test every deal for UK and worldwide from top brands across a variety of categories to ensure they work.
- Fresh deals daily: New discounts and offers are added every day, complete with expiration dates so you never miss out.
- Exclusive savings: Find special deals you won't see anywhere else, along with clear and transparent terms and conditions.
- Commitment to transparency: Clear expiration dates and terms and conditions for all deals.
- User-friendly experience: Our website is easy to navigate and search, with no annoying pop-ups or distractions.

Ready to unlock instant savings? Add the BudgetFitter extension now and experience the magic! ✨

By using this add-on, you agree to the BudgetFitter Terms and Conditions, which are available at: https://budgetfitter.co.uk/terms-and-conditions/

The BudgetFitter Privacy Notice can be found at: https://budgetfitter.co.uk/privacy-policy/
